description: The law professor testified against Judge Clarence Thomas during his confirmation hearings in 1991. What has changed since?
title: Revisiting What Happened to Anita Hill
title_page: Revisiting What Happened to Anita Hill - The New York Times
text:
Revisiting What Happened to Anita Hill The law professor testified against Judge Clarence Thomas during his confirmation hearings in 1991. What has changed since?
Hosted by Michael Barbaro, produced by Alexandra Leigh Young, Neena Pathak and Clare Toeniskoetter, and edited by Larissa Anderson and Lisa Tobin
